wikipedia_page.main: George Turner (1887–1958) was an English footballer who played for Stoke from 1908 to 1915. He was born in Stoke-upon-Trent.

response: *George Turner (rugby union, born 1855) (1855–1941), rugby union player for England, and St. George's Hospital Medical School RFC
